bibl.title: Early New Testament Manuscripts and Their Dates. A Critique of Theological Palaeography. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: I. The Problem of Dating Literary Papyri. - II. New Testament Texts and their Dates. - III. Comparison between the Theological and the Papyrological Approach. - IV. The Comparative Method in Palaeography. - V. Palaeography as a Historical Science. - VI. The Graphic Background. - VII. Case-studies: 1. The Earliest New Testament Manuscripts; - 2. Biblical Majuscule; - 3. Sloping Ogival Majuscule; - 4. Alexandrian Majuscule; - 5. Chancery, Documentary and Book Majuscules. - VIII. Conclusion. - "There are no first-century New Testament papyri and only very few papyri can be attributed to the (second half of the) second century."
